attributes.action: Do not let the camelia botnar childrens centre, worthing. close or remain unfunded
attributes.additional_details: We propose to the prime minister as well as all ministers in the house of commons, county councellors and whoever it may concern within the welfare and education bracket of government that they put emergency funding of £300,000 per annum in place to rescue this vital community resource for children and families with special needs that has been a key part in the local community for 35 years, we ask this as the county council are unable to release funds to save this resource that many disadvantaged people depend upon and is unique to the area, without it, it will leave many with learning difficulties and disabilities without a vital needs based preschool education in the West Sussex area
